title: Fresh tomato and seafood linguine
ingredients: ['150ml olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '150g red onion, finely chopped', '500g prawns, peeled and deveined', '500g scallops', '750g linguine', '6 plum tomatoes, seeded and diced', '8 heaping tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '50g freshly grated parmesan cheese']
